articles.description: Listen to 5 Live commentary and follow live text as Chelsea face Liverpool in the 2024 EFL Cup final at Wembley.
articles.title: EFL Cup final: Build-up to Chelsea v Liverpool - radio & text

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC radio commentary as France host Italy in Lille in the Six Nations.
articles.title: Six Nations: France lead Italy in Lille - radio & text

articles.description: England's hopes of forcing a series decider fade dramatically in the face of a stirring India fightback on day three of the fourth Test.
articles.title: England hopes fading after India fightback

articles.description: Pablo Sarabia's first-half header gives Wolves a hard-fought Premier League win over bottom club Sheffield United at Molineux.
articles.title: Wolves edge to hard-fought win over Sheffield United

articles.description: "Efficient" Arsenal are showing they have "no fear" as they maintain their momentum in the title race with a big win against Newcastle.
articles.title: 'We are living the dream' - Arsenal showing 'no fear'

articles.description: Switzerland's Marco Odermatt wins his third consecutive overall Alpine World Cup title with victory in California.
articles.title: Alpine World Cup: Marco Odermatt wins third World Cup title with 10 races to go

articles.description: Bordeaux striker Alberth Elis is in hospital after suffering a serious head injury in Bordeaux's Ligue 2 fixture against Guingamp.
articles.title: Bordeaux's Elis in hospital with serious head injury

articles.description: Celtic score twice in stoppage time as a comeback victory at Motherwell moves them back to two points behind Rangers in the Premiership title race.
articles.title: Celtic leave it late for dramatic Fir Park victory

articles.description: England silenced Murrayfield early on but made too many mistakes as Scotland recovered to retain the Calcutta Cup in the Six Nations, says Matt Dawson.
articles.title: 'England's capitulation disappointing after starting so well'

articles.description: Chelsea forward Fran Kirby withdraws from the England squad because of a "minor knee injury".
articles.title: Kirby pulls out of England squad with knee injury
